trends: There have been 18 other sightings in New Port Richey
There were no other sightings in New Port Richey on or around February 11th 2011
Summary: sphere object pulsating then shot off
divs: Sighting Detailswas actually my son and his 2 friends who saw it.by the time i came out it was gone.i was actually wondering if anyone else reported it.from their description it was a sphere shaped object with a yellow ring around it.it was approximately as high as a commercial jet in the sky.they said it moved slow at first from the north and moved south.as it got directly over them they said it pulsated as it continued moving slowly south then it just shot off at a high rate of speed to the south.they also said it made no sound what so ever.the whole event lasted approx 5 min.the thing that made me curious is that theyre all 9 yrs old and have no reason to lie.especially my son.he knows not to lie and they all gave the same description of the event when i asked them individually.they were all emphatic and excited.just wondering if anyone else saw this and curious as to what it was.thanks for any info u can give me
